title: The Queen Is Trend 9/8: Queen Elizabeth II, King Charles III, 61%, Steve Bannon, Quiet Firing,  Pinocchio, Podcast Movement
itunes:title: The Queen Is Trend 9/8: Queen Elizabeth II, King Charles III, 61%, Steve Bannon, Quiet Firing,  Pinocchio, Podcast Movement
description:
In this edition The Queen Is Trend; Long Live The King, Jack and Miles discuss the passing of Queen Elizabeth II, England getting a new king, Prince Charles getting a promotion, 61% of Republicans down for Trump (even if he's indicted), Steve Bannon turning himself in, employers clapping back with "quiet firing", the new Pinocchio film, and a Podcast Movement update!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
